name: Adventures in PegLand
description:
You wake up and decide to join the local chinese checkers tournament. There's a problem though. You don't have any teammates!

Controls
  • Move about: WASD / Arrow keys
  • Talk to pegs: E / Space / Enter
  • Clicking Inventory/Team buttons opens and closes the list
Known Bugs

Sometimes you might jump inside other things. You should jump back to where you came from to avoid breaking the game. You can't start to talk to characters if you are inside them...

Tips
  • Not everyone is willing to join you.
  • A police is next to the arena. There's a (broken) path to it.
  • There's a book on the route near the first cross roads. It should be easy to spot.
  • Arena is the place where the big brown gate is.

I made two linux builds. One is using Mono and the other IL2CPP. I don't have linux so I have no idea if they work.

Made for Alakajam's Adventure Kajam. Alakajam is a cozy jam community. Come say hi and join the next jam :)
https://alakajam.com/adventure-kajam/1211/adventures-in-pegland/
